name: Funky Lab Rat
description:
Play the role of the funkiest of lab rats and escape from the laboratory where you are held captive using your powers. You must be clever and avoid the traps in each of the laboratory's rooms. Combine agility and thinking to finish more than 80 levels. Stop time and modify the levels as you please. Freedom awaits you at the end of the way. Are you ready to take up the challenge?
- 11 worlds.
- More than 80 levels.
- Many hours of gameplay!
- Stop time and modify the levels.
- Collect pills and win gold, silver or bronze medals depending on your performance.
- Win platinum medals which award the best players.
- Unlock the game's 13 trophies.
- Play with the PlayStation®Move motion controller and the PlayStation®Move navigation controller. You can also use a DUALSHOCK®3 Wireless Controller.

Funky Lab Rat © 2010 Hydravision Entertainment. Developed and published by Hydravision Entertainment SA. PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
